meanings.definition: The quality or state of being like soap.
meanings.sent1: The soapiness of the bubbles made them easy to pop.
meanings.sent2: After washing the dishes, there was a lingering soapiness on my hands.
meanings.sent3: The soapiness of the floor made it slippery and fun to slide on.
meanings.sent4: The soapiness of the lake water reminded me of the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The soapiness of the shampoo left my hair feeling clean and fresh.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a soapy texture or feel.
meanings.sent1: I could feel the soapiness of the bar as I lathered it in my hands.
meanings.sent2: The soapiness of the sponge helped to scrub away the dirt easily.
meanings.sent3: The soapiness of the bathwater made it feel like I was swimming in bubbles.
meanings.sent4: The soapiness of the lotion made my skin smooth and soft.
meanings.sent5: The soapiness of the dish soap made washing up after dinner a breeze.
